name: Crash Bandicoot Fan Demo
description:
First time making a demo. I wanted to see if I could do it and I picked on Crash because it is an awesome game. Used the project as a way of learning how to use the Unreal Engine.

Very basic and only contains the 1 level.

If you like what you see and want to show your support, see more or even suggest another retro game you would like to see, find my channel on youtube; https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Iw_Z9nFueOoyOaS_v2Zhg

Controls:

w,a,s,d or up,down,left,right (To move)

spacebar (Jump)

 f (Spin attack)
